install.name: Amplify User Stats
install.author: Joommasters
install.description: The Amplify user stats module (modified from the Jms User Statistic module) displays your Joomla! user statistics. For support and other Joomla! goodies, please visit http://www.projectamplify.com.

param.name: latest_member_label
param.label: Latest Member Text
param.description: Enter the text you would like to appear before the Latest Member statistic.

param.name: total_member_label
param.label: Total Member Text
param.description: Enter the text you would like to appear before the Total Member statistic.

param.name: number_member_online_label
param.label: Members Online Text
param.description: Enter the text you would like to appear before the Members Online statistic.

param.name: number_register_today_label
param.label: Registered Today Text
param.description: Enter the text you would like to appear before the Members Registered Today statistic.

param.name: number_register_thisweek_label
param.label: Registered This Week Text
param.description: Enter the text you would like to appear before the Members Registered This Week statistic.

param.name: number_register_thismonth_label
param.label: Registered This Month Text
param.description: Enter the text you would like to appear before the Members Registered This Month statistic.

param.name: amplify_credit
param.label: Non-Visable Author Credit
param.description: Publish a hidden link to the Author of this free module (Link will not show on your site pages)

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module which allows individual module styling.
